start.text: First things first! No calling me mousey! I will get mad!
Umumu, I forgot what I was thinking about! What do I do!
Phew, thankfully the potion I just made is fine!

start_boss.text: I gotta make proper note of this

retreat.text: Captain, I just thought of a new potion formula, I'll go experiment first!

out_of_missiles.text: If we can use magic missiles, we will be able to keep going forever
How can I create self-replicating missiles

engaged.text: Does the Captain need Nonona's help!
The captain seems curious about Nonona, I wonder why

need_help.text: Umu, Nonona will need the Captain's help

pursuing.text: I will show you the true power of a great witch!

running.text: If you do this my ear will be itchy......when my ears are itchy......(Sneeze)

hull_90.text: The ship has received a bit of damage
Wawa, steams are coming out of the pipe

hull_50.text: Maybe I can make a better potion to repair the hull

hull_30.text: This bit of magic can't keep the ship going, what to do!

overload.text: Think, Nonona, what to do in times like this

death.text: With the protection from the magic circle, everyone is safe
Looks like I can't continue the research

victory.text: In the future, I will show more witch powers!
The captain seems curious about Nonona, I wonder why.
Captain seems very weird, this smile needs to be recorded in <The Codex of The Captain's Behavior>!
